Verses: 1 karththaave, Pollaadha Manushanukku Ennaith Thappuviyum; Kodumaiyullavanukku Ennai Vilakki Ratchiyum.
2 avargal Thangal Irudhayaththil Pollaappugalaich Sindhiththu, Yuththanseyya Naaldhorum Koottangoodugiraargal.
3 sarppaththaippol Thangal Naavai Koormaiyaakkugiraargal; Avargal Udhadukalinkeezh Viriyan Paambinvisham Irukkiradhu. (selaa.)
4 karththaave, Thunmaarkkanudaiya Kaigalukku Ennai Neengalaakki, Kodiyavanukku Ennai Vilakki Ratchiyum; Avargal En Nadaigalaik Kavizhkkap Paarkkiraargal.
5 agangaarigal Enakkuk Kanniyaiyum Kayirugalaiyum Maraivaai Vaikkiraargal; Vazhiyoraththile Valaiyai Viriththu, Enakkuch Surukkugalai Vaikkiraargal. (selaa.)
6 naan Karththarai Nokki: Neer En Dhevan Endren; Karththaave, En Vinnappangalin Saththaththukkuch Sevikodum.
7 aandavaraagiya Karththaave, En Ratchippin Belane, Yuththanaalil En Thalaiyai Moodineer.
8 karththaave, Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Aasaigal Siththiyaadhapadi Seyyum; Avan Thannai Uyarththaadhapadi Avanudaiya Yosanaiyai Nadandheravottaadheyum. (selaa.)
9 ennai Valaindhukollugiravargaludaiya Udhadugalin Theevinaigal Avargal Thalaigalaiye Mooduvadhaaga.
10 neruppuththazhal Avargalmel Vizhuvadhaaga; Akkiniyilum, Avargal Ezhundhirukkak Koodaadha Padukuzhigalilum Thallappaduvaargalaaga.
11 pollaadha Naavullavan Boomiyile Nilaippadhillai; Kodumaiyaana Manushanai Parakkadikkap Pollaappu Avanai Vettaiyaadum.
12 sirumaiyaanavanin Vazhakkaiyum, Eliyavargalin Niyaayaththaiyum Karththar Visaarippaarendru Ariven.
13 needhimaangal Umadhu Naamaththaith Thudhippaargal; Semmaiyaanavargal Umadhu Samugaththil Vaasampannuvaargal.
